scripts.package:linux: mkdir -p bin release && find release -type f ! -name 'README.txt' ! -name '*.zip' -delete && bun run build:linux && cp -R public bin/public && cp .env.example bin/.env.example && cp release/README.txt bin/README.txt && (cd bin && zip ../release/myinvois-gateway-linux-v${npm_package_version}.zip myinvois-gateway public .env.example README.txt -r) && rm -rf bin/public bin/.env.example bin/README.txt
scripts.package:windows: mkdir -p bin release && find release -type f ! -name 'README.txt' ! -name '*.zip' -delete && bun run build:windows && cp -R public bin/public && cp .env.example bin/.env.example && cp release/README.txt bin/README.txt && (cd bin && zip ../release/myinvois-gateway-windows-v${npm_package_version}.zip myinvois-gateway.exe public .env.example README.txt -r) && rm -rf bin/public bin/.env.example bin/README.txt
scripts.release: bun run clean && bun run package:linux && bun run package:windows
